name: Strange Shores
description:
A short adventure on a nameless island.

Meet its bizarre and friendly inhabitants and follow their advice to build yourself a way home.

Average play time: ~15 mins.

If you experience low framerate, try disabling fullscreen mode in the pause menu (escape key) and resize the window.

Music, sound effects, and dialogue by Andrew Carroll.

Art, programming, and guitar by Raius.

Water shader by hgouveia: https://github.com/hgouveia/godot-toon-water-shader-port
